title: Post-Pandemic Era Virtual Collaborative Learning and Assessment Competency-Enhanced Mathematics Education

context.additional_context: Improvement needed in project-based collaborative learning and assessment in digitally supported environments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete mathematical problem-solving projects with over 80% participation using virtual collaboration tools.
Learners can exchange peer assessment feedback three or more times via digital platforms and improve learning outcomes by 20%.
Learners can design math projects reflecting real-life applications and create evaluation rubrics with 90% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
